body: //article[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' article-container ')]
author: //article//span[@itemprop="author"]
date: //article//span[@itemprop="datePublished"]/@content

strip_id_or_class: share
strip_id_or_class: shareList
strip_id_or_class: article-actions

prune: no

test_url: https://answersresearchjournal.org/gypsies-darwinian-eugenic-holocaust/
